dt-example.title: Bootstrap 4
dt-example.info:
This is the `-init searchPanes`extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example shows DataTables and the searchPanes extension being used with [Bootstrap 4](http://getbootstrap.com) providing the styling. The DataTables / Bootstrap integration provides seamless integration for DataTables to be used in a Bootstrap 4 page.
